titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency shall have authority to regulate air pollution on and over the outer continental shelf.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 1/6/1987--Introduced. Amends the Clean Air Act to grant the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency authority to regulate air pollution resulting from an activity regulated under the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act.
